title: (17500) Ripoll - 3 Carrer del Bisbe Morgades
description:
Laundromat with the possibility of paying by credit card / debit card.
No parking nearby.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 16 Passeig de la Farga Catalana
title_short: (17500) Ripoll - 16 Passeig de la Farga Catalana
description: Next to the center to visit.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 1 Avinguda del Comte Guifré
description: Cemetery car park. Near the center. Very calm. There is no service, but to visit Ripoll it is fantastic. In the evening there is the lighting of solar street lamps.

name: Ripoll Can Guetes
title: (17500) Ripoll Can Guetes
description: Ripoll Can Guetes. Ripoll area, drain and water (free!). Parking possible (24h), but most of them sloping :-( If in all cities it could also be realized. Directly in the city center. It is great and clean.  Free Wi-Fi spot. There is a park for dogs, even.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 13 Carretera de Barcelona
description: Automatic laundry, with coins or credit card. Washing machines and drying machines.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 1 Carrer de Concepció Ducloux
description:
The car park is paved; the pitches are delimited and painted on the ground. The water taps don't work. The toilet cassette is emptied through the hatch at the end of the gray water drainage channel

New area for motorhomes, urban parking, drinking water and emptying of gray and black water. Next to the Dehesa Park with a children's playground and the sports center. shops and supermarkets very close.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 3 Carrer General Fuensanta
description: Gravel parking lot we slept there in our van. A little noisy but for one night it's very bearable

title: (17500) Ripoll - 70 C-151A
description: Car park on the outskirts of Ripoll, in a business area. No services, except for two tables with benches to sit on.

title: (17500) Ripoll - 13 Carrer Vall d'Aran
description: Picnic area with tables and a drinking fountain. Located in front of a gas station, restaurant bar and several supermarkets.

name: Camping Solana de Ter
title: (17500) Camping Solana de Ter
description: Camping behind a hotel, registration at the hotel reception. Clean and functional toilets. Located directly on a river, LIDL within walking distance. Tennis courts and pool available, pools only open in summer

title: (17500) Ripoll - 103 Carretera Ribes
description: Large shaded company car park next to the river. Ideal to make a technical stop. There is no barrier, no height limit and very flat.

title: (17500) Ripoll -
description: Large esplanade near the road (not much traffic). We have slept one night without problem. There is some shade. It's a bit dirty.

name: Camping Ripollès
title: (17500) Camping Ripollès
description: Camping on a slope. Relatively narrow and steep access. Not suitable for campers too long. Friendly staff. With bar, restaurant and playground (indoor and outdoor).

title: (17530) Campdevànol - 18 Carrer Castell
description: Small ground parking. Just for the night, by the side of the road. There is a table and benches and rubbish bins nearby. It is not pretty, to get out of trouble.

title: (17530) Campdevànol - 10B Carrer Teuleria
description: Very quiet neighborhood, high in the town. There is trash, but no more services. Parking on both sides of the road.

title: (17530) Campdevànol - 7 Plaça P.p. Pla de Niubo
title_short: (17530) Campdevànol - 7 Plaça P.p. Pla de Niubo
description: Parking area in case you want to do the Ruta dels 7 Gorgs since the closest area has a height limitation (1.95m) and from the information point they refer you to this point of the road (km 2) located in a polygon industrial. Then you have to walk 20 min along a well-marked path to the beginning of the route.

title: (17531) Campdevànol - 7 Barri Sant Llorenç
description: Free picnic area in the middle of nature. It has about fifteen stone tables, with a lot of shade. There are free access barbecues and you can cook with camping sites, but not before mentioning it to the park guard who welcomes you in the parking lot. There you have to park (it closes at 9pm, without the possibility of staying overnight) and you have to walk 100m to the picnic area. Highly recommended to stop for lunch or to do the 7 gorgs route. Height limit 1.95m

name: Camping Pirinenc Campdevanol
title: (17530) Camping Pirinenc Campdevanol
description: Campdevànol, GI-401. Camping Pirinenc Campdevanol. All services and possibility of making the great road of the seven lakes.

title: (17510) Ripoll - Camí de Llaés
description: Petit prat on the coast of the Vallfogona stream. No hi hem passat la nit perquè l'hem descobert just després d'haver passat la nit in an altre park4night to the mateixa road. The road is a rural path and practically no traffic.

title: (17530) L'Herand - Unnamed road
description: Empty small round street near old bridge and river

title: (17530) L'Herand -
description: Located directly on a river. clear water and the car can stand well. not visible from the street. great for a refreshment on the go or to stay overnight.

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 3P Plaça Cal Gat
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 3P Plaça Cal Gat

title: (17510) Llaés -

name: Camping Molí Serradell
title: (17531) Camping Molí Serradell
description: Camping Molí Serradell - Very quiet and family campsite with many green areas and excellent services.

title: (17510) Ripoll - Unnamed Road
description: Small flat area ideal for a quiet night's sleep and visit the "Bufadors of Bevi" area. The path of the excursion begins about 2 km from the place of the night, but it is recommended to spend the night here, to be a flat area and having a picnic table.

title: (17533) Bruguera -
description: Small corner at the foot of the Taga, before reaching the parking lot. Sufficiently flat and relatively sheltered terrain. It is a few meters from the road, but it is very little traveled. If you go up the hill a bit the views are spectacular.

title: (17533) Bruguera - Cami de Coll de Jou
title_short: (17533) Bruguera - Cami de Coll de Jou
description: Ideal place to sleep and in the morning make the ascent to Taga (2041m). Incredible views. Room for 7-8 vans.

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 1 Passeig de l'Estació
title_short: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - 1 Passeig de l'Estació

title: (17512) Les Llosses - C-26

title: (17860) Sant Joan de les Abadesses - Unnamed Road

Last 100m of steep slope but well paved. A mini-excursion can be to go down to Ogassa for breakfast, there are two signposted routes. So that they also did not prohibit this area above, let's be clean and that there are no signs of our passage when we leave (papers or similar) You can not spend the night. All over town there are no motorhome signs.

title: (17860) Colonia Llaudet - 17 N-260

We asked in several places and they confirmed that AC parking and overnight stays are allowed (obviously, without camping). There is a bakery with delicious pastries right next door. Perfect place to visit the town.

title: (17861) Ogassa - Unnamed Road

title: (17534) Ribes de Freser - 9 GIV-5217

name: Càmping Vall de Ribes

Ribes de Freser, 12 Carretera de Pardines. Campsite Vall de Ribes. In the campsite, the path is not very easy for large motorhomes. Very close to the rack railway to Nuria. The village of Ribes is nice, small shops.
shower, Wifi, electricity extra.

title: (17534) Ribes de Freser - 21 Colonia Saida, Colonia

title: (17861) Sant Martí de Surroca -

We just went in a van, but I strongly advise against motorhomes with too low ground clearance! Otherwise it is possible to climb to have a 360° view after 4km of hiking. The view is superb. The temperature can drop out of season and the wind blows quite often.

title: (17862) Vallfogona de Ripollès - 68 N-260a

Starting point for hikes

we parked there for the night it is very quiet

Weekend 32 euros. They accept animals. The owner's name is Bea, very kind and sympathetic. Ideal for excursions around to enjoy the view.

title: (08586) -

The town is a 5-minute walk away, where there are bars, restaurants, bakeries and grocery stores. Garbage 400m from the parking lot. To access the parking, follow the indications on the signs to access through the much more comfortable upper area, towards La Molina. There is mobile coverage. Currently they have installed the water and electricity exchange services but they are not finished yet.

Good views, a little slope when parking.

title: (08571) Torelló - BV-5228
description: Perfect car wash with an extra high platform. Here you can also wash large Womos.

title: (08619) Borredà - BV-4656
description: Nice place, surrounded by pine trees and nature, wide and flat. Highly recommended.

title: (08696) Castellar de n'Hug - 10 BV-4031
description: The parking is private and belongs to the El Moli de les Fonts restaurant. If you want to stay overnight, you must notify the local. If the premises remain closed, you have to park at the end of the parking lot since it is open to the public. Thank you!

title: (17536) Toses - 6 GIV-4016
description: Wanderparkplatz with picnic areas, gravel access

title: (17866) Camprodon - 21 C-38
description: An area at the entrance to the campsite Vall de Camprodon open 24h / 24h

title: (08570) Torelló - 94 Carrer del Ter
description: The area could be very nice. but currently it is not possible to fill water or empty. it's all clogged up. a shame it needs maintenance. it is better to put a small fee or charge for electricity instead of giving it away and giving it adequate maintenance.

title: (08696) Castellar de n'Hug - 7 BV-4031
description: Quiet place next to a chapel with a fountain and plenty of shade between the trees

name: Camping Vall de Camprodon
title: (17866) Camping Vall de Camprodon
description: Camprodon, 21 C-38. Camping Vall de Camprodon, located 2 km from the center of Camprodon bike along a quiet road. East of the River Ter, well located to discover the valley, plus an area at the entrance open 24 hours

title: (08619) Borredà - 30 C-26
description: Párking perfecto para iniciar rutas por la zona, además de estar muy cerca del Gorg del Salt.

title: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - 10 Carrer Piscina
description: Perfect spot for 6-8 camper or motorhomes. It’s a public parking lot but during the night gets empty and free to use. Really nice place with access to playground, swimming-Pool and Bar/Restaurant.

title: (08570) Torelló - 45 Carrer del Ter
description: Perfect to spend the day and night

title: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - 18 Carrer Setcases
description: Ideal parking to visit the village or spend the night

title: (08619) Borredà - 12 Carrer Barcelona
description: Motorhome area. All is correct.

title: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - 6 Carretera Setcasas
description: Small open field next to the town

title: (08619) Borredà - 14 Carrer Vilada
description: Street without houses, with an ideal place to spend the night. nobody is disturbed.

name: Càmping Conca de Ter
title: (17869) Càmping Conca de Ter
description: Vilallonga de Ter, GIV-5264. Càmping Conca of Ter. Camping next to the river Ter, near the village of Vilallonga 4 km from Camprodon, ideal place to explore the valley. Attention, no services without overnight stay.

title: (17534) Queralbs - Carretera de Serrat
description: Edge 4x4 path, in the countryside, far from the village, hidden in the fir trees.

title: (08619) Borredà - 21 Carrer Queralt
description: several public parking spaces between 6 and 7 m. long. Next to the city of Borredà, quiet and good access.

title: (08570) Torelló - 1 Passeig el Firal
description: Parking on the quiet side of the river and with good trees for shade. 2 minutes from downtown Torello a town that is quite a bit with a lot of history. 2 minutes have supermarkets, pharmacies, municipal market. Be careful on Wednesday March2 and the transport of fruit.

title: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - Carrer Camí del Canal
title_short: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - Carrer Camí del Canal
description: Small picturesque village. Parking for motorhomes.

title: (08619) Borredà - 81 Carrer Manresa
description: Parking at the gates of the Borreda cemetery. Three or four large vans fit, being careful not to block access. There are benches with shade and a fountain, as well as recycling bins.

title: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - Camí de Fontlletera
title_short: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - Camí de Fontlletera
description: Pretty flat place next to the dirt track (you have to climb carefully but normal cars go up). Ideal to start the climb to Balandrau (the start of the excursion can be done 1km higher, but it is more pending). Quiet night. Please respect the environment.

title: (17178) Girona - 275 Lloc Sant Privat d'en Bas
title_short: (17178) Girona - 275 Lloc Sant Privat d'en Bas
description: Picnic area where begins a beautiful trek to the “Salt de Sallent”. There is a toilette in the bar. Be aware of the openingtimes, out of the season it's closed with a chain.

title: (17869) Llanars -
description: Esplanade next to the road, little traveled at night. We slept one night and everything is fine. Without services, between Vilallonga de Ter and Llanars.

title: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - Camí de Fontlletera
title_short: (17869) Vilallonga de Ter - Camí de Fontlletera
description: Beautiful place with amazing views! It is not advisable to go with children through nearby precipices.

title: (17534) Queralbs - Carretera de la Central
description: Parking of the Daió Electric Power Plant Relatively flat, half-paved area with a narrow and concreted road, but suitable for motorhomes. From here there are multiple excursions to take. The closest is the Salt del Grill about 25 minutes away.

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 3 BV-4031
description: Parking day and night, shared with cars and the occasional trailer., There are always 4/5 free spaces. Without services but the deal with the neighbors is unbeatable. 2 minutes from the town center.

title: (17866) Camprodon - 136 Diseminado Afuera Camprodo
description: Water at Repssol station

title: (08570) Torelló -
description: In the super friendly forest next to a hombre river and the sound of water

title: (17536) Toses - GIV-4016
description: Easy access by 4x4 or with a small van right next to a small stream you go back to the end of the road in reverse to sit quietly on the roadside quite far away but ideal for a short meal break

title: (17869) Llanars - 138 Diseminado Despoblado
description: Shaded area a few minutes from Llanars. You have the river next to it and little influx of cars

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
description: This unusual building by Antonio Gaudi stands in the middle of nowhere. Absolute peace reigns here at an altitude of over 1300m. Flat pitches with no other extras. 2 km to the Mirador. DO NOT drive up from Lillet with a motorhome. Too narrow, too steep and in bad condition. Access only from the Diseminado Santuari Sta Mare Folgars overnight stay, west of it.

title: (17867) Camprodon - 30 Diseminado Afuera Camprodo
description: Access by dirt track a few kilometers. Natural place. Take care of nature. Ideal for hiking trails.

title: (08570) Torelló -
description: Quiet place next to the river to spend the night and be able to spend the day. Road little traveled during the day.

title: (17176) -
description: Road that goes to the Can Turó restaurant. No services but quite flat. Space for a large ac or two small ones. The place to turn are problems. Very calm. You have to leave the road that goes up to the parking lot above Salt Sallent and turn left. About 400m. Hidden and we have spent the night calm. There is no sign of prohibition and the restaurant workers passed by and said nothing to us. It does not bother the circulation. Good place for hiking.

title: (08589) Perafita - 4 Passeig del Remei
description: Parking 5 minutes from the center of Perafita ideal to visit the village. Without service

title: (08696) Barcelona - s/n Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Parking of the Artigas gardens, a beautiful place to visit from the architect Gaudí. Access through the old town, difficult for a motorhome, better only a camper. Access to the car park is on the tourist train tracks for the last 100m. There are better places nearby to spend the night.

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 6 Carrer Escorxador
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 6 Carrer Escorxador
description: Parking area of about 20 places approx. AC and cars. Without time limitation. There is a water and electricity supply point for a fee (see photo). It is on the other side of the first parking lot that you find when you arrive at the town. Currently they are improving access, a bit difficult to get in with an AC. Ideal to visit the town or start a route through the area.

title: (08572) Sant Pere de Torelló - GIV-5273
description: Parking lot for 4 motorhomes in Coll de Bracons. We had a very quiet night. From the first hour of the morning, it was filled by the hikers' cars.

title: (08696) Barcelona - 10 Diseminado Afores
description: Small square surrounded by greenery with a fountain and picnic tables. sleeping possible. Fountain with spring water and shadow. 5 minutes to Antonio Gaudi's Gardin de Antiguas.

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 9 Carrer d'Antoni Costa
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - 9 Carrer d'Antoni Costa
description: Parking in the center of the city without services, but very quiet next to the river Llobregat without problems to spend the night

title: (08570) Torelló - 66 Carrer de Rocaprevera
description:
Beautiful quiet place to take a break.
If you walk up to the 3 crosses you have a magnificent view of the area.

title: (08619) Borredà - Unnamed Road
description: Next to the hermitage of Sant Sadurní de Rotgers, a beautiful restored 10th century Romanesque building. Easy access by track in very good condition from Borredà. Be careful, do not try to access from Vilada, it is a non-passable track for vans. Spectacular setting.

title: (17867) Camprodon - 23 Carretera de Sant Joan
description: You can park and sleep without problems, very close to the town. It is not paved, they also park cars. The space is very large.

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place to spend the night and a good place to start hiking trails. The path can be done little by little, we have climbed with a Citroen Jumper L3H2. Space for a van, at most two small ones.

title: (17867) Camprodon - 5 Carretera St Juan Antigua
description: Parking at the entrance to Parc Mare de la Font. Great place for a rest stop or to visit the city and the park.

title: (17867) Camprodon - 5 Carretera St Juan Antigua
description: Large esplanade of land where you can park, there is space for many vehicles and close to the town center. relatively level

title: (17813) Sant Pere Despuig -
description: You can not stay overnight! It is a guarded parking. The Mossos and the Rurales pass by.

title: (08696) Castellar de n'Hug - 3 BV-4031
description: Parking at an old cement factory, which is now a museum. You can stand in the parking lot or drive a short distance (100m) a gravel road, then msn is in nature.

title: (17534) Queralbs - Carretera de Fontalba
description: Fontalba parking, nice landscape. On the way up, the road is gravel for about 8km. There was a lot of camper and some motorhome. On foot, in 1h30 you reach the Sanctuary of Nuria, with little unevenness.

title: (17867) Camprodon - 3 Carrer del Costabona
description: Car park in the center of Camprodon, it is the second car park on the right just entering the town. Unpaved area with space for large vehicles. passing a small bridge you access the other car park where only small vehicles fit.

title: (08696) Barcelona - 97 Diseminado Afores
description: Parking for the gardens

title: (17867) Camprodon - 12 Passeig de Maristany
description: Ideal place to stop for lunch. Little traffic and lots of shade. Located on Paseo Maristany, 10 minutes from the center of Camprodon.

title: (17867) Camprodon - GIV-5264
description: Parking where you can stay overnight, no service, quiet, 5 mins walk from the center of Camprodon, there is a fountain for water. Small vehicles only

title: (08696) La Pobla de Lillet - B-402
description: Parking tourist railway, empty to spend the night quietly

title: (08589) Perafita - 53 Carrer Major
description: Picnic parking right at the entrance of the town. Spacious and with picnic tables. Good views. Town well known for the typical cocas. There are several bakeries where you can taste them

name: Camping Riera Merles
title: (08606) Camping Riera Merles
description: Highly recommended family campsite. A few minutes away you will find the river and different pools to bathe. We will come back for sure

title: (17867) Camprodon - Unnamed Road
description: After a few kms of track for 4x4 in the direction of the Sant Antoni hermitage, you will find a parking lot on the left with breathtaking views and a relaxing calm. The start is 1 km from Camprodon

title: (08589) Sobremunt - Unnamed Road
description: Place to stay beside gravel road came in demountable pick up camper good views of hills

title: (08606) Borredà - Unnamed Road
description: Site very close to the campsite. Nearby you have some very nice pools to bathe.

title: (17869) El Catllar -
description: Small but very nice place to eat and soak in the river.

name: Camping de La Vall de Bianya
title: (17813) Camping de La Vall de Bianya
title_short: (17813) Camping de La Vall de Bianya
description: Camping with everything you need, very good family facilities, summer cinema and closed cinema room, swimming pool, bar-restaurant, games room, two playgrounds for children, paddle tennis courts, soccer field, basketball court, dog park, It is the best mountain camping without a doubt

title: (17536) Toses - 22 BV-4031
description: Parking in the Port of Creueta. Exit of several trails. Quiet night in the middle of nature. Good views of the Cadí-Moixeró park.

title: (17536) Toses - Carretera de Toses
description: Next to a football field and games for children. The train goes right by. Quiet and right next to Toses pretty typical village.

title: (17867) Camprodon - 3 Carretera de Molló
description: Space right on the side of the road in the iron source. quiet place next to the river, although there are already houses on the other side of it. fishing area with lures

title: (08619) Borredà - C-26
description: Shady place by the side of the road. Ideal for a stopover. No services or containers. Don't mess it up.

title: (17813) Sant Pere Despuig - N-260
description: Parking next to the road with some shade, ideal for a siesta or spending the night.

title: (17813) - N-260
description: Open space next to the little crowded road, ideal for eating, resting or spending the night

title: (08696) - 36 Diseminado Santuari Sta Mare Folgars
description: Recreational area of ​​Falgars with picnic tables and barbecue area. There are two parking areas before arriving at the hostel, in the second is where we have slept, quiet and without any problem. Vamós with two dogs and have been loose most of the time since cars barely pass. In the area we also find garbage service, fountain and wc (now closed) The hostel has a bar / restaurant where you can go for a drink.

title: (17867) Camprodon - C 38
description: Day parking

title: (17867) Camprodon - Carrer dels Llandrius
description: Parking located near the golf course and a small river with many springs around, right at the junction of the unpaved road leading to the mountain of San Antoni with a chapel and spectacular views of the eastern Pyrenees. Quiet place on land, 1 km from the town of Camprodon. Good access.

title: (17536) Toses -
description: Space to stop at the side of the road with spectacular views. Little traffic, only some motorcycles and bikes. The cows and horses will come to visit you so that you can take a picture of them next to your van or AC. On the same road there are other similar spaces.

name: Àrea d'Autocaravanes Les Masies de Voltregà
title: (08508) Àrea d'Autocaravanes Les Masies de Voltregà
title_short: (08508) Àrea d'Autocaravanes Les Masies de Voltregà
description: RV park with all services including electricity, with picnic area. On Sundays there is a flea market at the entrance to the area. There is a restaurant just across the street. Very clean with flower boxes. The only downside: the place is along a fairly busy road. Well done by this community.
